iterations.reasoning: The job description for a Finance & Accounting Manager reveals critical procurement infrastructure and technology stack details. It confirms the active use of 'Aspire' (corporate spend management) and 'Osome' (online bookkeeping), indicating a preference for cloud-based Fintech solutions over traditional ERPs. It also highlights ongoing procurement needs for external services including tax consultancy, statutory audit, and legal compliance to navigate the complex regulatory environment between Indonesia (PSAK) and Singapore (ACRA).
